item.title: Nee help with minigame
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

purpose:::To make a waiting arena for whatever purpose you like…

ServerBase:::PimpScape
. .
Difficulty:::0.0000000000000000000000000000001/10

STEP 1:

search for public int PkingDelay =

press ENTER after that and add

	public int TeleTimez0r = 240;

STEP 2:

press enter after the ‘int’ you just added and add:

	public boolean izInArea = true;

STEP 3:

search for

[code]public boolean showingCity = false;/code]

and directly above that add:

public boolean izInArea() { if (absX >= !!!! && absX <= @@@@ && absY >= #### && absY <= $$$$) { return true; } else { return false; } }
((((( !!! = lower left corner X coord, @@@@ = top right corner X coord, #### = bottom left corner Y coord, $$$$ = top right corner Y coord)))))

STEP 4:

if you’re lazy , search for

boolean process() {

hit enter after that and add

[code] if(izInArea = true) {
TeleTimez0r–;
}

	if(TeleTimez0r == 6) {
		txt4 = "3";	 
		string4UpdateRequired = true;
	} else if(TeleTimez0r == 4) {
		txt4 = "2";
		string4UpdateRequired = true;	
	} else if(TeleTimez0r == 2) {
		txt4 = "1";
		string4UpdateRequired = true;
	} else if(TeleTimez0r == 0) {
		txt4 = "PLAY!";
		string4UpdateRequired = true;
		teleportToX = 2398;
		teleportToY = 5153;
	}[/code]

[glow=red,2,300]NOTE: it may tele port you once as soon as you log in or it may not… if it teleports you when yuo’re not even in the zone, please tell me because i will remove as i may have missed something.[/glow][/code]

Read full topic
